data.title: Lubomirski
data.text:
The members of this family bear the title Prince Lubomirski/Princess Lubomirska, Count[ess] of Wisnicz und Jaroslaw (Serene Highness). The head of the two main lines is Fürst Lubomirski.

Line I

Alexander Michael Pr Lubomirski (d.1675)

1a) Stanislaus Heraclius, d.17 Jan 1702; m.1st Sophia Opalinska (dsp); m.2nd Henriette Elisabeth Gfn von Dönhoff (d.14 May 1702)

1b) Joseph, d.11 Jun 1732; m.1st ___ Belzecka; m.2nd Therese Css Mniszech (d.Apr 1746)

1c) Anton (26 Dec 1718-8 Mar 1782); m.21 Sep 1752 Sophia Css Krassinska

2c) Stanislaus (25 Dec 1722-12 Aug 1783); m.9 Jun 1753 Elisabeth Helene Anne Pss Czartoryska (21 May 1736-Vienna 1816)

1d) Maria [Isabella?] (4 Jun 1755-17 Mar 1783); m.27 Dec 1772 Ct Ignatz Potocki

2d) Alexandra (1757-19 Mar 1830); m.2 Jun 1776 Ct Stanislaus Potocki (1755-14 Sep 1821)

3d) Julia (1760/1763-26 Aug 1799); m.9 May 1783 Ct Jan Potocki (8 Mar 1761-20 Nov 1815)

4d) Constantia; m. Ct Severin Rzewusky

3c) Maria Anna, d.1763; m. Ct Wenzel Rzewusky

2b) Theodor (17 Aug 1697-6 Feb 1745); m.1729 Marie Anne Elisabeth “Madame Christ”, cr “Gräfin von Comignie” (d.26 Oct 1776); he adopted Maria Susanna Anna Christ (probably his stepdaughter), who m.Miklós Gf Esterházy

1c) Caspar (Nov 1734-18 Dec 1779); m.Mar 1772 Pss Barbara Lubomirska (1754- ), later wife of Prince Poninski

1d) Heinrich (Oct 1777- )

2d) dau (posthumous 1780- )

2a) Hieronymus August, d.20 Apr 1706; m.Anne Victorie von Alten-Bockum, sister of Fstn von Teschen (see below)

1b) George [Ignatz] (15 Mar 1691-19 Jul 1753); m.1st 1719 Css Marie Magdalene Bielinska (d.20 Apr 1730); m.2nd Dresden28 Feb 1737 Johanne Charlotte Frn von Stain zu Jettingen (1 Mar 1723-30 Sep 1783)

[by 1st m.]:

1c) Theodor (15 Aug 1726-Apr 1761); m.1 Mar 1753 Eleonora Gfn von Malachowsky (d.Apr 1761_

1d) son (20 May 1756- )

[by 2nd m.]:

2c) Maria Josepha; m.Adam Fst Poninski (d.Warsaw 4 Aug 1798)

3c) Adolph (1744-Dresden 7 Apr 1774)

4c) George Joseph; note: some genealogies confuse him with George Martin (below)

5c) Franz; m.NN à issue

6c) Barbara (posthumous 1754- ); m.Mar 1772 Pr Caspar Lubomirski (Nov 1734-18 Dec 1779); m.2nd 1781 Pr Calixt Poninski

2b) Johann, d.Dec 1736; m. Css Ursula Barbara Branicka (d.Jun 1776_

1c) Marie Caroline, d.10 Jan 1795; m.23 Oct 1753 (div 1760) Pr Karol Radziwill (27 Feb 1734-22 Nov 1790)

3b) Jacob Alexander (11 May 1695-Dresden16 Nov 1772); m.4 Nov 1717 Friederike Charlotte Gfn Vitzthum von Eckstädt (12 Nov 1700-4 Feb 1755)

1c) Friederike Constantie (30 Aug 1718- ); m.1st 18 Jun 1743 Roland Puchot Cte des Alleurs (d.23 Nov 1754); m.2nd 12 May 1760 ___ de la Bourdonnaye, Marquis de Liré

2c) Henriette Charlotte (18 Jul 1720-24 Oct 1782); m.23 Sep 1745 Carl Georg Friedrich Gf von Flemming (d.19 Aug 1767)

3c) Louisa Amalia (3 May 1722-27 Jul 1778); m.4 Jun 1739 Friedrich August Gf von Rutowsky (1 May 1702-16 Mar 1764), nat .son of Elector Friedrich August I of Saxony
